title: medical_emergency
description: A medical emergency occurs during a busy shift.

timeline.title: Initial Collapse
timeline.description: Staff member collapses in the cafeteria. Check for responsiveness and call for help.

timeline.title: First Aid Response
timeline.description: Trained responders arrive on scene. Begin CPR and retrieve AED. Call 911 immediately.

timeline.title: EMS Notification
timeline.description: Emergency Medical Services dispatched, ETA 6 minutes. Continue first aid and monitor vitals.

timeline.title: Patient Stabilization
timeline.description: Patient shows signs of improvement. Maintain care and prepare for EMS handoff.

timeline.title: Transport Preparation
timeline.description: EMS arrived. Clear access routes and provide patient information to paramedics.

timeline.title: Site Cleanup and Debriefing
timeline.description: Patient transported to hospital. Secure AED, document incident, and offer support to witnesses.
